Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mccc.cos210.fp2014.cm.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AiPlayer, LocalPlayer, NetworkPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Abstract player class. Generic player object, containing the update model and update methods in addition to some a game model and a color.
